content: What if, just what if mah, the soil here isn't fertile enough to grow other sproutsies...? My head hurts just thinkin' about it, but mah, no big deal!

content: {A害羞冒烟}<style=SizeSmall>S-So I was thinking, could I maybe live next to you...?</style> I don't want to cause you grief! D-Don't mind me!

content: I wonder what kinds of crops will do well in this soil... {A笑眯眯}After I move in and get everything set up, I'll go 'round and do some diggin'...

content: {A歪头}How come I can taste the soil even from far away? I was just born this way.

content: Well mah, I could even mix different fertilizers to make anything thrive.

content: My eyes and nose ain't all that sharp. {A笑眯眯}Maybe The Skies Above wanted to make it up to me this way.

content: This is my first time travelin' and livin' on my own, and I'm a lickle nervous. Gran'mama always said that neighbors are important...
info: 云果选址-云果闲聊_主流程文本II

content: <style=PlayerName>{me}</style>, are you wonderin' where I want to stay? I, uh... might've mumbled something about living next to you... {A惊讶}Y-You heard that?!
info: 云果选址-云果闲聊_主流程文本II

content: {A笑眯眯}I've been learnin' from Gran'mama since I was little. There's always a way! I'll whip up the perfect fertilizer to make sure anythin' you plant in this soil thrives.

content: W-Well mah, I'd like to be livin' somewhere close to the ground. {A沉醉闻}That way, I taste the soil's flavor. Any place that's good for farmin' will be fine by me.

content: <style=PlayerName>{me}</style>, still haven't made up your mind? I don't mind where I live... Are you wondering if I have a preference?
